resources.name: mcp-server-statistics
resources.title: MCP server statistics overview
resources.description: Aggregated statistics for all static MCP servers, including total counts and averages per server for prompts, resources, and templates.

resources.name: mcp-editor-statistics
resources.title: MCP server editor statistics overview
resources.description: Aggregated statistics for all user-managed MCP servers, including total counts and averages per server for prompts, resources, and templates.
